ComicInfo.Summary: Death and Birth: Sara attends Jake's full dress funeral. Later, on her way into work, Sara is run over by a blonde girl who causes Sara to spill coffee all over her blouse and then has the audacity to cop an attitude (this is, of course, the first meeting between Sara and future Witchblade wielder, Danielle). Sara and Patrick learn that Ian Nottingham has escaped from Rykers Island.
